title: Cant see who the champ is ....
body:
On the free to play rotation ,showing the champions, u cant see {{champion:28}} face. Pls adjust it so {{champion:28}}  face is showing.
 Is this some kinda of joke where she has a invisiblity :P

replies.body: At least it shows the only thing you need to know about her.
I came to the boards to do the same thing! Haha. Glad I'm not the only one who noticed.
Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it!
